connector.description:
Send data to a Cassandra Cluster.

This Kamelet expects the body as JSON Array. The content of the JSON Array will be used as input for the CQL Prepared Statement set in the query parameter.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.host.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.host
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.host.description: Hostname(s) cassandra server(s). Multiple hosts can be separated by comma. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.port.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.port
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.port.description: Port number of cassandra server(s) Example: 9042

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username.description: The username to use for accessing a secured Cassandra Cluster

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password.description: The password to use for accessing a secured Cassandra Cluster

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.consistency.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.consistencyLevel
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.consistency.description: Consistency level to use. The value can be one of ANY, ONE, TWO, THREE, QUORUM, ALL, LOCAL_QUORUM, EACH_QUORUM, SERIAL, LOCAL_SERIAL, LOCAL_ONE

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.preparedSta.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.preparedStatement
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.preparedSta.description: The Prepared statement to execute against the Cassandra cluster table
